instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-01949: What is 820-01949? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01949</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>  "comes on then resets"
threads.message:
No water damage.   No physical damage.

Unit will turn on.  then reset.   I can get it into DFU mode and it acts like it's recovering then resets.
I can put it into recovery and select my wifi.   and it will stay on as long as I leave it there but if I enter the wifi and continue it starts to load then resets.

It is almost like a power FET CPU issue not sure.  All the rails are fine until it resets.

Any ideas from experience on this one?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01949</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>  "comes on then resets"
threads.message: Could you log in starting in safe mode?
